operator: George M. Campbell Oil & Gas Company
circumstances: On final approach to Winkler County Airport, the twin engine airplane stalled and crashed, bursting into flames. Both occupants escaped with minor injuries while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Stall on final approach after the pilot failed to maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Unfavorable wind conditions, 
- Downdrafts, updrafts,
- Wind gusts to 18 knots.
